title: Basil, or, Honesty and Industry
creator: Charlotte Grace O'Brien
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of Basil, or, Honesty and Industry by Charlotte Grace O'Brien. Read by Robert Harder A poor boy discovers the value of honesty and industry. More than that, he discovers the value of his relationship with God (Introduction by Robert Harder) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobooks; fiction
